name: rotate PDF
description:
rotate PDF

A narrative game with various forms of gameplay, like 2D exploration and a desk simulation.

Have you ever wondered how to rotate PDF? If yes, you are in good company!

Take on a strange journey through a mysterious organisation. A fresh perspective on storytelling awaits you in this 2-hour long mystery indie title.

Features:

  • Fun Desk Physics
  • Deep Insight into your own Psyche 
  • A unique way to tell a Story

FAQ

  1. It it weird? - Yes.
  2. Is it fun to play? - Hell yes.
  3. Can you pet animals in the game? - Technically yes, although that might be a bit of a strech.
  4. How can I support the developer? - If you liked the game, you can support my Patreon and get your name hidden somewhere in it.

Supported languages: English, Deutsch
